conbody.p: The Hive Metadata processor includes two output streams:

dlentry.dd: Passes records downstream to the Hadoop FS destination. You can add additional stages between the Hive Metadata processor and the Hadoop FS destination if pipeline logic requires it, but only the Hadoop FS destination can use the generated record header attributes to write records to HDFS.

Passes the metadata records downstream to the Hive Metastore destination. The metadata output stream does not pass record data of any kind.
You can add additional stages between the Hive Metadata processor and the Hive Metastore destination if pipeline logic requires it, but only the Hive Metastore destination can use the metadata record to update the Hive Metastore.

conbody.p: The following image shows how you should connect the output streams:
